name: Homestay-in-sakleshpur
tagline: Sakleshpur is in the National Highway 48 (NH48) of Bangalore to Mangalore. Sakleshpur is located in the western ghat of malnad region. There are best places to stay in Sakleshpur homestays and the resorts. Sakleshpur stay is the best place to relax from the stress and tiredness, and to enjoy with the nature. In the stay pure malnad cuisine will be provided with the varies of adventurous activities.
